Package no.kartverket.positionorientation

This package contains everything needed to maintain a transformation between the Tango coordinate system and a geographical coordinate system.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KalmanFilter.PredictionMatrixUpdater
    Set model and covariance matrixes for the next Kalman filter prediction step
    OriginUpdateListener
    Objects that handle geographic objects should implement this interface.
    Transform.Observation
    Generic observation
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KalmanFilter
    Simple implementation for a Kalman filter.
    PositionOrientationProvider
    Keeps track of the devices position and orientation
    TangoPositionOrientationProvider
    Provides position and orientation information for the application.
    Transform
    Builds and maintains a transform between two coordinate systems by a robust estimation of transform parameters based on various observations of common objects in both coordinate systems.

Package no.kartverket.positionorientation Description

This package contains everything needed to maintain a transformation between the Tango coordinate system and a geographical coordinate system. The main access point to this package is the abstract class PositionOrientationProvider with its specific realization: TangoPositionOrientationProvider. The package requires the Efficient java matrix Library (ejml), currently of version 0.31.
